entries.journal_entry_description: EV-9D9 has had three droids escape his care. He believes that they are taking refugee inside of a storage facility run by the Darklighters. EV -9D9 wants you to first place a pain bolt on the droids and then destroy them. One of the droids to find and eliminate is LIN-34..
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: EV-9D9 has given you a pain bolt to attach to LIN-34. You have to attach it first before you destroy the droid or EV-9D9 will not get the necessary transmission.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: You have applied the pain bolt to the LIN unit. Its pain threshold regulators are off-line. Destroy it and the automatic recording device will send its death agonies back to EV-9D9.
entries.task02_comm_message_text: Very good. The synaptic responses spike well beyond the cut off levels. I have sent compensation to your account.
